00020 #include "linestream.h"
00021 #include "textutils.h"
00022 
00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace TextUtils {
00024 
00025     using namespace std;
00026     
00027     LineStream::LineStream(std::istream&i, char commentChar) : 
00028         is(&i), commentChar(commentChar) {}
00029     
00030     LineStream::LineStream(std::istream*i, char commentChar) : 
00031         is(i),  commentChar(commentChar) {}
00032         
00033     bool LineStream::readLine() {
00034         lastComment = string("");
00035     
00036         while(1) {
00037             std::getline(*is,line);
00038     
00039             if(is->fail()) {
00040                 return false;
00041             }
00042 
00043             // We ignore empty lines
00044             if(line.empty()) {
00045                 continue;
00046             }
00047             
00048             // If line is a comment
00049             if(line[0]==commentChar) {
00050                 // We save the rest of the comment line 
00051                 lastComment += line.substr(1).append("\n");
00052                 // and we go forward in the file
00053                 continue;
00054             } else {
00055                 return true;    
00056             }
00057         } 
00058     }
00059     
00060     vector<string> LineStream::tokenize() {
00061         return RDK2::TextUtils::tokenize(getLine());
00062     }
00063

00067         cerr << "Reading now line " << line << endl;
00068         return linestream; 
00069     }*/
